TESTING DURING SAP IMPLEMENTATIONS - PROJECTS, VARIATIONS AND CHALLENGES
The On-Demand Webinar Replay of this webinar is now available

WEBINARS
Check out our Webinar Depot for latest updates | Check it Out!!
In today's complex business world, SAP ERP is one of the most important technologies to be implemented to sharpen the organization's competitive edge. It supports the integrated business process and speeds up the decision-making process to reach more customers, suppliers, and partners. But testing the packaged software systems like SAP ERP is becoming a great challenge for companies to reach their requirements.
Want to know how testing the SAP applications is an important factor for getting the desired results? as our experts from Miracle's QA CoE will discuss about the SAP testing challenges and share key insights of testing methodologies. They will also explain about the factors to achieve quality in SAP ERP implementation projects.
